Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: ckeilts
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera due to the 700tvl and the 65ir leds for my home.  I just put the camera up and tested the camera and wow what a piece of junk.  The resolution quality is very poor and there are very dark areas due to the bright sun.  Well if this is to be used outside then what do I due with the dark areas.  So then I waited till night time to test the IR system and another let down.  If you are looking to watch your home up close you will never see the perp.  I will definately be sending this crapper back to market.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor security camera
Reviews.Author: Lin Hammond
Reviews.Content: I like this camera very much. I installed it about 18 feet off the ground. It works perfectly at night without any lighting and in total darkness. The picture is very clear. I would purchase this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: reason I bought this camera is my father has same one and it is bright at night and very high quality picture.  Plus, I like that you can actually see the camera because of its size....my other cameras are small and you can hardly tell i have a security system on the outsides of my house

Reviews.Title: THE SELLER WILL NOT REPLACE DAMAGE PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Daniel C. Medeiros "Daniel M"
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 camera and a recorder  and a power supply . The recorder was bad from the first time that i received it and try with the seller to get replaced  and all the did was give me  a run around. the Sony Camera works great .Be very careful dealing with this people

Reviews.Title: hi rez outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera as one of a 4 camera application at my work.  This camera is installed 30 ' from the ground and 50' from the loading dock.  I picked this camera as it has a manual zoom.  Once set-up for zoom you need to manually focus. This is not a problem except for needing a second set of eyes on monitor.  I am happy with this purchase.  Good value!

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: WarrOne
Reviews.Content: This is a halfway decent camera.  I was finishing up security install and needed one more than originally planned.  The audio and power are totally standard and worked with the other equipment flawlessly.  The fact that it is an outdoor camera without needing a box was nice, but I thought it could have some thicker rubber gaskets to make sure that it lasts through years of bad weather.Also the camera didn't have the "throw" that i was expecting  from this style of camera, but the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Much better ir output than most others I've tried.
Reviews.Author: brian west
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great camera if concealment is not an issue. Looks much more professional and higher quaility than your typical kit cctv camera. I've got mine zoomed partially to a 20 foot wide section about 50 to 60 feet away and the ir's give me enough light to a person, though no detail. I live in the country though and it gets pitch black!! Though picture quality is improved from 480 cameras, I don't feel this gives the image quality one would expect with a 700tvl camera.Still great camera and a solid build.

Reviews.Title: Great Value and Quality
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: It's a good outdoor camera with weatherproof housing. There are many infrared LEDs (maybe about 65, I forget) for night vision, so the image quality is very good even at night. I could not be happier with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I didn't know too much about cameras when I ordered this. I purchased this security camera as an upgrade to an existing home security camera. This camera is definitely an improvement. The camera is easy to use and operate, has great zoom features. Very decent image quality in low lighting situations with quick light response. In fact, I considered this brand because I bought this brand product and felt it was ok. I couldn't be more satisfied and happy with my choice.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E imager, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor
700 TV lines high resolution. NTSC system. IP66
Built-in 65 Infrared LEDs. 4-9mm Varifocal lens
Weatherproof housing. Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Package included: 1 of SONY CCD camera, 1 of power supply and 1 of security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor 700TVL Day Night Infrared Security Camera Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E DSP 65 IR LEDs 4-9mm 3X Zoom Lens for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance with Power Supply and Security Warning Sticker CJZ
